attributes.action: All Remain Politician Voters To Resign Including Sadiq Khan
attributes.additional_details: The U.K. Decided to leave the EU so all remain voting Politicians to resign on the day  David Cameron resigns as Prime Minister
attributes.background: All politicians that voted remain should resign as the UK has voted to leave the EU and a vote of no confidence to be issued against all remainers

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual minister or politician is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned.
